unnormalised: **Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to Funding Vidya This Year?**
normalised: **Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to Funding Vidya This Year?**

unnormalised: Tired of endless chai and Maggi while studying? Scholarship portals are buzzing like Diwali crackers, offering a way to fund your education dreams! Forget slogging through dusty library books trying to find opportunities.
normalised: Tired of endless chai and Maggi while studying? Scholarship portals are buzzing like Diwali crackers, offering a way to fund your education dreams! Forget slogging through dusty library books trying to find opportunities.

unnormalised: These EdTech platforms are basically online treasure chests, matching students like Rohan Verma in Delhi with scholarships based on their merit and needs. Many offer options for everything from IIT entrance coaching to pursuing masters abroad. Think of it as online matchmaking, but for academic funding!
normalised: These EdTech platforms are basically online treasure chests, matching students like Rohan Verma in Delhi with scholarships based on their merit and needs. Many offer options for everything from I I T entrance coaching to pursuing masters abroad. Think of it as online matchmaking, but for academic funding!

unnormalised: Several portals are currently offering scholarships of up to Rs. 50,000. Institutions like the Manipal Institute of Technology are partnering to streamline the application process.
normalised: Several portals are currently offering scholarships of up to rupee fifty thousand. Institutions like the Manipal Institute of Technology are partnering to streamline the application process.

unnormalised: With Onam around the corner, many Malayali students are looking for scholarships to ease the financial burden. So, ditch the biryani takeout for a week and use that money for application fees instead! These portals could be your golden ticket to a brighter future! Check them out – you might just be surprised!
normalised: With Onam around the corner, many Malayali students are looking for scholarships to ease the financial burden. So, ditch the biryani takeout for a week and use that money for application fees instead! These portals could be your golden ticket to a brighter future! Check them out – you might just be surprised!
